# Set up notebook
## Load libraries & functions
```{r warning=F}
source(here::here("libraries.R"))
library(graph4lg)
```

## Import files
```{r}
# pop map
pops <- read.csv(here("./genomic_resources/pop_map3.csv"))


# vcf
# this dataset should be pretty liberal re: parameters- a relatively low R and mmaf
vcf <- read.vcfR(
  here::here("./summary_stats/output_populations_no-IBD/mmaf0.007662_R0.5/populations.snps.vcf"),
  verbose = FALSE)

## Convert vcf to genind object
my_genind <- vcfR2genind(vcf)


# add pops to genind
pop(my_genind) <- pops$population

# convert to genepop and export
my_genepop <- graph4lg::genind_to_genepop(my_genind,
                                          output = here::here("./clean_data/genepop_for_Ne.txt")) 

```
